text: I'm getting this error when trying to swap an image inside of a module (granted setup in kind of a complex way with macros but I think that's unrelated):
so there's no way to move saved drag and drop email templates from portal to portal from the UI... but is there any way to do this from the API?
is there a proper way to clean-up the leftover duplicate or non-deleted modules that still exist inside of design manager?

I have everything saved locally, if I just delete the whole folder would that work? Would those modules still exist in production? Would the duplicate modules be removed from production if they are removed from staging?
using the remove parameter helps with this hs watch local-folder remote-folder --remove
then things you remove locally are removed on remote too
besides that yes its pretty safe to just delete the thing in the design manager and then just re-upload from the CLI
